com.mobius.vdrapi
Class DocumentServerQueryParam

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.mobius.vdrapi.QueryParam
        |
        +--com.mobius.vdrapi.DocumentServerQueryParam
public class DocumentServerQueryParam
extends QueryParam

The DocumentServerQueryParam is a subclass of the QueryParam class, and provides extra parameters that can be used when creating document server lists.

Constructor Summary
DocumentServerQueryParam(String keyValue, ComparisonSpec comparison, int requestCount, SortOrder sortOrder, Vector typesAllowed)
          Constructor that creates the list of document server types allowed in this query.

          Changes the types allowed .
 SortOrder sortOrder()
          Returns the sort order for the list of document servers.
 Vector typesAllowed()
          Returns a vector of DocumentServerProtocol objects representing the allowed types.

Constructor Detail

DocumentServerQueryParam

public DocumentServerQueryParam(String keyValue,
                                ComparisonSpec comparison,
                                int requestCount,
                                SortOrder sortOrder,
                                Vector typesAllowed)
Constructor that creates the list of document server types allowed in this query. The maximum request count value is 32767. If you specify a request count greater than 32767, the maximum value of 32767 will be used instead.

Returns the sort order for the list of document servers.

Returns a vector of DocumentServerProtocol objects representing the allowed types.
